backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping CRM features to related source files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference list summarizing frontend source files and their purposes for build planning.
frontend/env.json: Environment config containing backend canister ID and II derivation origin.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining root container and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component with dashboard, CRM tabs, backend status, and reminder overlay handling.
frontend/src/backend/backend.did.ts: Empty Candid interface and IDL factory for the backend canister.
frontend/src/backend/index.ts: Factory for creating a backend canister actor using HttpAgent with local development support.
frontend/src/components/Debug/Diagnostic: Diagnostics UI showing captured logs with copy and clear actions, refreshed live.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary that displays detailed error, stack traces, and reload or copy actions when a crash occurs.
frontend/src/features/leads/components/L: Displays lead details, supports editing, deletion, and WhatsApp actions with formatted timestamps.
Form for creating or editing leads with validation and status, notes, and follow-up fields.
Full-screen reminder popup showing due follow-ups with snooze and complete actions.
Lead list with search, follow-up bucket filters, sorting, and quick WhatsApp access.
Main CRM module combining list view, lead creation, and detailed lead editing via dialogs.
frontend/src/features/leads/hooks/useLea: Hook managing lead CRUD operations, local state, status updates, and follow-up changes.
frontend/src/features/leads/model/lead.t: Defines Lead interface plus status enums, labels, and associated UI colors.
frontend/src/features/leads/reminders/us: Hook that detects due follow-ups and triggers active reminder state.
frontend/src/features/leads/storage/lead: LocalStorage utility for loading, saving, updating, and removing leads.
frontend/src/features/leads/utils/follow: Classifies leads into follow‑up buckets, filters and sorts them by follow‑up date, and provides a simple search function.
frontend/src/features/leads/utils/snooze: Defines snooze duration options and computes a new follow‑up timestamp based on minutes.
frontend/src/features/leads/utils/whatsa: Normalizes phone numbers and builds or opens WhatsApp deep‑link URLs for leads.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes related queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks, including a backend status check based on actor availability.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and defines light/dark theme color variables using OKLCH.
frontend/src/lib/logCapture.ts: Captures console errors, warnings, and uncaught exceptions into an in‑memory log buffer.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query and Internet Identity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom color tokens, themes, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state, goals, architecture, features, and known issues for an offline Android‑focused reminder and CRM app.
